title: 106_s2950
content: Requires descendants of such Indians to have reasonable rights of access to, and use of, federally acquired land within the Site. Directs the Secretary to: (1) grant to any descendant or tribal member reasonable access to federally acquired land within the Site for carrying out traditional, cultural, or historical observance. And (2) dedicate a portion of the Site to certain burial and commemorative remains and objects. Authorizes appropriations.
